title: COVID Whisks Away Wisconsin
description:
Wendi Nix, Todd, McShay, and David Pollack discuss the decision to pause all Wisconsin sports activity and Trevor Lawrence's indecision on whether or not to return for another year. Wendi talks to Tom Allen about Indiana's upset over Penn State last weekend and looking forward to this week's matchup against Rutgers

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live Crew talks Wisconsin's COVID crisis
